title: SJB Parliamentary Group ready to support Ranil’s Government
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Samagi Jana Balavegaya’s Parliamentary Group has unanimously decided extend support to the Government led by Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe on decisions taken for the betterment of the country and to uplift the country.
The SJB said it would provide its support towards the Parliamentary process on the said matters, and would NOT obtain any position in government.
BREAKING: Curfew from 8 PM tonight (16) to 5 AM on Tuesday (17)
